import React,{useState}from'react';import'../styles/Table.css';// Assuming you have some CSS for styling
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductForm=_ref=>{let{onAdd}=_ref;const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',category:'',cost_price:0,selling_price:0,stock:0});const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onAdd(formData);setFormData({name:'',category:'',price:0,stock:0});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"Product Name",value:formData.name,onChange:handleChange,className:"form-control",required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"category",placeholder:"Category",value:formData.category,onChange:handleChange,className:"form-control",required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"price",placeholder:"Price",value:formData.price,onChange:handleChange,className:"form-control",min:"0",step:"0.01",required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"stock",placeholder:"Stock",value:formData.stock,onChange:handleChange,className:"form-control",min:"0",required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Add Product"})})]})});};export default ProductForm;
